title: Went from S1 to SV
body: Hey guys If you can go through my Match History youll see im sitting at a 29% Winrate the past 20 games and was on a 14 game loss streak can someone explain to me how i carried myself from SV to S1 only to drop back to SIV and soon to be SV can someone explain this to me? im starting to think that these games are rigged and that riot is forcing me a 50% win/loss ratio is this only me? im starting to see paterns in this ranked matchmaking system , is it just me? there no way i was winning games easily in silver now only to drop back to the bottom? i was sitting at 55% winrate ratio now im dropped to 50% how ? can someone explain please? its frustrating me alot , i also realised a increase in trolls , afks , dc and most of the time people in their placements where placed on my team ? does riot force a 50% win/loss ratio? also the games are always one sided except when i was in S1 , someone tell me whats going on? yes im on tilt but ive taken breaks and to only come back to the same thing? the games are really one sided i also checked the MMR on both teams and the other team is usually 100+ higher in MMR and the elo of my team players are worse then the other? 298 wins - 290 losses

replies.body:
>im starting to think that these games are rigged and that riot is forcing me a 50% win/loss ratio is this only me?

Yes it's only you who is deranged enough to think this.

If this is the case, how is it nearly every challenger in OCE has a 55%-70% win rate

It's just as likely that someone will have a lucky winning streak as an unlucky losing streak. Difference is most people will put the lucky streak down to playing well, or being better than their division, or deserving some luck for a change instead of seeing it for what it is. Maybe you got lucky and got to silver 1, then you were out of your depth and fell back down.

Naturally even very good players will trend towards a 50% winrate as they begin to be matched with players of equal skill and start to be evenly matched with their enemies. If you have a 50ish % winrate over a sample size as big as 600 games, the fact of the matter is that you're at about where your skill level is.

And yes, alot of games are one sided. These aren't the games that you need to carry to climb. The games you need to carry are the ones that are close (and there WILL be close games) and make sure these close games are ALWAYS turned into a win by you playing better than the enemies and tipping the scales in your favour.

If you want to get out of silver, pick a split push champion, and mindlessly split push until you are platinum. Your games are not rigged, it just seems that way because when you tilt, it makes your team tilt. Trust me i felt exactly the same for a period of time.

Your teams can't be trolling because you are the only player on your team therefore you are the reason for every loss you ever have and are just bad if you can't get out of silver. It is not a team game so it must be only you who are losing the games.
